name: Lamb with egg sauce
recipeInstructions: 1. Heat the oil in a large pad, add the onion and cook until tender.
2. Add the meat and fry for 5 minutes until browned.
3. Stir in the wine and some salt and pepper, then cover and braise for 30 minutes until the lamb is tender.
4. Meanwhile lightly beat the egg and egg yolks in a bowl, then add the parsley and lemon juice.
5. Take the pan off the heat and pour in the egg mixture, stirring. The egg should not scramble, but be silky smooth.
6. Cooked the asparagus in simmering water until soft.
7. Serve the lamb with the asparagus and ciabatta bread.
